title: TFW You realize...
body:
Everyone making those "Downvote Farm" posts are actually using reverse psychology to try and get upvotes...

https://media.giphy.com/media/dxbPGFv7tSK3e/giphy.gif

I've given so many upvotes to those posts just to spite them, and now I realize... It was what they wanted all along...
https://media.giphy.com/media/l0HlxoXbk3BNVz2IU/giphy.gif

replies.body:
That's how I get upvotes
"How many people can I trigger in one post"
seriously guys, it works
cuz' people are dumb
BUT I DID IT FIRST!!
http://i.imgur.com/GiapkPg.gif?noredirect
Everyone = triggered
(that's how to get downvotes)

I genuinely wanted downvotes.

Serious.

But my unintentional starting of the trend wound up with people who actually wanted upvotes.

~~I'm the weakest dark wizard ever.~~
Well, at least I accomplished my spiting goal with you...
I gave you upvotes to spite you since you were asking for downvotes.

Oh yeah? Well what if I downvoted you, hah!

...I'm going to admit, that was actually pathetic.

Then, since you want downvotes, I'll give you ANOTHER UPVOTE!!!!

MUWHAHAHAHAHA!!!

The beauty in these posts is that you win either way.

If you get downvotes, you're getting what you asked for. If you get upvotes, you...get upvotes.

http://66.media.tumblr.com/c173d9d31fc0f20812ce1ef7f5062723/tumblr_nk9lfeKcm51u1oa4do2_500.gif
You said something about spiting people?
I tried, people just found Yasuo and Yi too funny
